# itemTitle(for:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func itemTitle(for csc: UICloudSharingController) -> String?
```

## Discussion

Implement this method to provide a meaningful title to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] invitation screen.

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingControllerDelegate/itemTitle(for:)] is called only when creating a new share. For an existing share, the title is retrieved from the share using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/cloudkit/cksharetitlekey] key, which is set when a new share is saved.



## Configuring the view controller

- **itemType(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the Uniform Type Identifier (UTI) of the item.
- **itemThumbnailData(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the thumbnail image data to display on the invitation.
